desc: Connie's Children's Shop of St. Clair Shores Michigan since 1954. Preemie baby kid and children boutique clothing and shoe store. Stride Rite, Mayoral, Mud Pie, Sperry, Plae, Joan Calabrese, Under Armour, Little Me. Clothes, Shoes, Christening, First Communion, Flower Girl Dresses, Boy Suits & Tuxedos, School Uniforms.

layout.text: Serving the St. Clair Shores & Grosse Pointe Community since 1954
